cause.description:
ADHD / ADD/ ODD/ OCD these can all have an effect on your child /children and can often be hard to understand and deal with.
this is a support group for parents to discuss what works you what works for me
Although it can often be challenging to raise a child with these disorders it's important to remember they aren't "bad," "acting out," or being difficult on purpose. They have difficulty controlling their behavior without medication or behavioral therapy.
1. Supporting parents of children with ADHD/ ADD/ ODD/ OCD
2. Finding Solutions & helping to understand the disorders
3. It can be mentally exhausting for a parent with a child with these disorders. we need more support groups for these parents.
cause.name: Supportting parents of children with ADD/ADHD/OCD/ODD
